page.title: 08Fish Processing, Fraserburgh
page.content: The largest industry in Fraserburgh is fish.One of the largest fish factories is"Mac Fisheries Ltd".It has a working force of about 600 people. It is owned by,Doctor Francis Clark. There are a lot of different jobs in the factory.{Filleting}is the only job that you have to be qualified to do. Some of the{products}they make are, {smoked salmon,salmon pate,lemon sole, {kippers,smoked mackeral}and{cod. The fish are{frozen}before they leave the factory.In case of accidents there is a qualified nurse.There is also a canteen for the workers when they have their break.The canteen serves many different meals and snacks. {Iain Mowat (14)
